data.scheme_name: Bihar IT (Information Technology) Policy 2024 - Lease Rental Subsidy - Female - All Categories - Existing
data.benefits:
Scheme provides reimbursement of 50% of the lease rental amount paid.
Additional 5% incentive to Women owned enterprises.
data.eligibility: All existing IT/ITes/ESDM units are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. IT/ITeS/ESDM units shall have to ensure that minimum 60% of employees must be stationed in Bihar. 
  2. All incentive shall be applicable after commercial production and till max. period of 5 years. 
  3. Units must have GST registration of Bihar. 
  4. Reimbursement to the applicant will be done on submission of proof of payment made by the applicant to the authorities.
data.beneficiaries: All existing IT/ITes/ESDM units are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. IT/ITeS/ESDM units shall have to ensure that minimum 60% of employees must be stationed in Bihar. 
  2. All incentive shall be applicable after commercial production and till max. period of 5 years. 
  3. Units must have GST registration of Bihar. 
  4. Reimbursement to the applicant will be done on submission of proof of payment made by the applicant to the authorities.
data.context: Bihar IT Policy 2024 introduced to develop the IT/ ITeS and ESDM industry of the State for inclusive socio- economic growth and gainful employment generation, and to emerge as the next investment destination for IT/ ITeS companies in the country, while offering an enabling environment for industrial investments, stable policies and transparent governance.
data.objective: The main objective of this scheme is to build a strong eco-system for nurturing innovation in the State and empower them to grow across domains in the IT/ ITeS and ESDM sector.
data.description:
Scheme provides reimbursement of 50% of the lease rental amount paid.
Additional 5% incentive to Women owned enterprises.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through http://investit.bihar.gov.in/InterestForm
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the lease rental reimbursement for a period of 5 years subject to the prescribed condition.
data.additional_info:
1. The minimum turnover per employee per annum for the IT unit must be INR 20 lakh whereas minimum turnover per employee per annum for the ESDM unit must be INR 50 lakh. 
  2. To avail any benefits under this policy, minimum 25 direct Employment must be generated and at least 50 % of total employment must be for persons having permanent domicile of Bihar. 
  3. IT / ESDM units shall have to ensure that minimum 60% of employees must be stationed in Bihar. 
  4. Additional 5 % incentives, shall be provided to SC / ST / BC/ EBC/ Women / Divyangjan / War widow / Acid attack survivors / Third gender entrepreneurs who must have hold minimum 51 % of shareholding in IT / ESDM units and should also hold Director or equivalent position in the co. 
  5. Additional 10 % incentives shall be provided to IT/ ESDM units established outside Patna and Danapur Municipal area. 
  6. Units which have availed benefits under this policy shall not be eligible to avail benefit for the same investment under any other policy/scheme of the state and vice versa. 
  7. Dovetailing with the central government schemes shall be allowed
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate
GST Registration Certificate
Sel-declaration by organization
Biometric records copy of attendence of employees
Copy of Payments
Project Report
Registered Lease Deed
Energy bill 
Applications
KYC Documents
Incorporation Certificate
Letter of Authorization,
Undertaking
First Sale Bill/Invoice/ Certificate from Labor department (Expansion)
Degree Certificate of all employees
PF/ESI Statement
Self-Declaration of Incentive Availed
Domicile certificate for employees from Bihar
Unit self-declaration and maintain Aadhar Card, 
Rent Agreement for Stationed Employee
Lease Deed, Rent Receipt, Acknowledgment for lease payment
Applicable category Certificate of the Promotor, Directors, who is having stake holding of 51% or more
Other documents as required
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: 2nd and 5th floor , Technology Bhawan, Bailey Road , Patna 800015 (Bihar)
Ph. No.: +91-612-2547315
Email ID: invest.it@bihar.gov.in
data.beneficiary: IT/ITeS Industry - Proprietorship, Partnership, Limited Liability Partnership, Private Limited Company, Public Company - Bihar - All MSMEs and Non-MSMEs
